t: Can I use BBC Sounds with my Amazon Alexa device? | BBC Sounds
s: Yes, you can. With the BBC Sounds skill, available to UK listeners, you can listen live to all BBC radio stations and play all of our on-demand content, including programmes, podcasts and music mixes. The following video has some information on how to sign in and enable the BBC skill, as well ...
Podcasts – music – radio – live events – sound design
